name: dropzone-react
title: Dropzone (React)
description: A file upload dropzone component powered by Convex storage. Supports drag and drop, file validation, upload progress, and full Convex backend.
docs:
## Post-Install Setup

1. Run `npx convex dev` to start the Convex dev server.

2. Copy the deployment URL to your `.env` file as `VITE_CONVEX_URL`.

3. The Convex schema and functions will be automatically deployed when you run `npx convex dev`.
